scripts.build:debug: npx asc assembly/index.ts -b build/debug/chain.wasm -t build/debug/chain.wat --debug --sourceMap --runtime stub
scripts.build:release: npx asc assembly/index.ts -b build/release/chain.wasm -t build/release/chain.wat -O3 --sourceMap --runtime stub
scripts.test:publickey: npx eosio-asc testpublickey.ts --target release && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_publickey
scripts.test:table: npx eosio-asc testtable.ts --target release && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_table
scripts.test:asset: npx eosio-asc testasset.ts --target release && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_asset
scripts.test:action: npx eosio-asc testaction.ts --target release && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_action
scripts.test:mi: npx eosio-asc testmi.ts --target release && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_mi
scripts.test:serializer: npx eosio-asc testserializer.ts --target release && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_1serialize
scripts.test: yarn test:publickey && yarn test:table && yarn test:asset && yarn test:action && yarn test:mi && yarn test:serializer
